item.title: Visual Layouts – Isotope Filtrify and custom WordPress taxonomies
item.description: Creating tag and category based filtering is easy using my new plugin Visual Layouts Filtrify.. and now I want to show you that custom post types and custom taxonomies in WordPress are also handled with this new plugin. Using two of my plugins, you can create a visual grid of your posts, photos, portfolio, products and even use it to create your own WooCommerce e-commerce product page without having to get a new theme.
